Summary Method

Source: R/hstats.R
summary.hstats.Rd

Summary method for "hstats" object.

# S3 method for hstats
summary(
  object,
  normalize = TRUE,
  squared = TRUE,
  sort = TRUE,
  top_m = Inf,
  eps = 1e-08,
  ...
)

Arguments

object

Object of class "hstats".

normalize

Should statistics be normalized? Default is TRUE.

squared

Should squared statistics be returned? Default is TRUE.

sort

Should results be sorted? Default is TRUE. (Multioutput is sorted by row means.)

top_m

How many rows should be shown? (Inf to show all.)

eps

Threshold below which numerator values are set to 0.

...

Currently not used.

Value

An object of class "summary_hstats" representing a named list with statistics.

See also

See hstats() for examples.
